data.prayer: Spirit, help the 3,221 believers find a person of peace today among the 828,879 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Blue Nile, Sudan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Blue Nile, Sudan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 68 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Blue Nile, Sudan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Blue Nile.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Blue Nile. Through your servants plant 166 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Komo people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Komo people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Blue Nile, Sudan that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Blue Nile, Sudan.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Blue Nile to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
